Activity: Wake up, review the morning's pre-market reports.
Arrive at the office. Respond to urgent emails and prepare for the weekly team meeting.
Lead the weekly team meeting with all members. Review progress on key milestones, address any challenges, and set priorities for the coming week.
Meet with @Qres-1, @Qres-2, @Qres-3 for a final review of the week's research and modeling efforts. Address any outstanding issues and provide guidance for future research directions.
Review the fund's marketing plan and launch strategy with @mkt-1 and @ir-1. Provide final approvals and ensure all necessary resources are in place.
Lunch Break. Celebrate the end of the week with the team.
Meet with @audit-1 (External Auditor) to discuss the fund's audit plan and compliance procedures. Address any questions or concerns from the auditor.
Review and approve all outstanding invoices and expenses related to the fund's launch.
Plan for the next week's activities. Focus on the fund's launch and initial trading operations.
Send out a weekly progress report to senior management, highlighting key achievements and upcoming milestones.
Leave the office. Enjoy the weekend.
